title: "bcl_convert"

## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script target/nextflow/demux/bcl_convert/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name               | type         | description                                                       |
|:-------------------|:-------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------|
| --input            | file         | Input run directory                                               |
| --sample_sheet     | file         | Pointer to the sample sheet                                       |
| --output           | file         | Output directory containig fastq files                            |
| --separate_reports | boolean_true | Should reports be stored in a separate dir.                       |
|                    |              | Should be used with the --reports argument.                       |
| --reports          | file         | Reports directory                                                 |
| --test_mode        | boolean      | Should bcl-convert be run in test mode (using --first-tile-only)? |
